Notes: I can't source these anywhere pre-soldered :( I've not tried them myself but these push fit headers might be a reasonable solder-free alternative: https://thepihut.com/products/2-54mm-0-1-pitch-press-fit-male-pin-header

All the bits for the project should fit on this form factor, but a larger board gives more space to work with. [Version with markup for pico](https://thepihut.com/products/breadboard-for-pico) makes pin placement easier without constantly looking at the pin diagram, but isn't essential.
